about_the_game:
[WELCOME]

In this experimental horror wander the endless randomly generated mall
that is different with every playthrough.

Encounter a range of strange and unique entities that inhabit this place
with each offering unique mechanics and dangers that will
test your senses.

Death is your best guide in learning how to exist in this place.
Don't expect too get far in your first existence.

Sanity is your most valuable possession here.
It can even be used to buy items that some
might deem useful.

[GAMEPLAY INFOMATION]

-Play time of each run can range from a few minutes to potentially a few hours once mastered.
-The different entities found deeper in the Mall are usually more dangerous
-There are unique areas that can spawn further in the Mall
-Getting far in the Mall can be quite hard and if you are unable to survive the first few entities that can spawn near the start, you might not find this enjoyable
-Ingame achievements to work towards
-Few props are moveable/physics-based
-Distance tracker and time tracker with highscores
-This game does NOT contain graphic violence, gore, or strong language
-This game requires sound to be played properly as some situations require audio cues
-This is not a story-driven game, however, there is hidden lore
-Works with Praydog's UE VR injector

[GRAPHICS INFOMATION]

-3 lighting options available in the main menu (including an experimental ray tracing option)
-Designed with heavily limited use of in-game UI to increase immersion (doors open when pushed, useful items picked up automatically, player starts panting when out of stamina ect...)
-No motion blur
-VSYNC is enabled by default (which caps your fps to your monitor's refresh rate to fix frame misalignment artifacts) VSYNC can be disabled.
-Graphics, FOV, Volume, controller and mouse sensitivity can be adjusted in-game

The graphics and amount of content has been improved since the game's release in April 2024 and I will continue to add more updates based on the games ongoing reception. Be sure to let me know what you enjoyed and what else you'd like to see and I’ll do my best to make it happen!

[WELCOME]

In this experimental horror wander the endless randomly generated mall
that is different with every playthrough.

Encounter a range of strange and unique entities that inhabit this place

Sanity is your most valuable possession here.
It can even be used to buy items that some

-The different entities found deeper in the Mall are usually more dangerous

-Few props are moveable/physics-based

-No motion blur
-VSYNC is enabled by default (which caps your fps to your monitor's refresh rate to fix frame misalignment artifacts) VSYNC can be disabled.
-Graphics, FOV, Volume, controller and mouse sensitivity can be adjusted in-game

The graphics and amount of content has been improved since the game's release in April 2024 and I will continue to add more updates based on the games ongoing reception. Be sure to let me know what you enjoyed and what else you'd like to see and I’ll do my best to make it happen!
name: DON'T EXIST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4350 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Will run on epic settings on most gaming hardware depending on the resolution set, including laptops that can handle 3D games. Runs well on the Steam Deck
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In this experimental horror wander the endless randomly generated mall and encounter the strange and unique entities that inhabit it. Death is your best guide in learning how to exist in this place.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
